categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic squads

nodes.text: Skua Squad was a clone trooper unit within the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. Trooper CC-4572, nicknamed "Ganch," became the only survivor of the squad following a botched mission that occurred early in the war.
Skua Squad was created by Sideshow Collectibles in 2012, for Celebration VI's exclusive figure of Commander Ganch, and were mentioned on his cardback.
